segment.source: You must be connected to the Internet to Log In!
Log in and select Offline Available in the audio project card menu and then log out. Or, click IMPORT AUDIO PROJECT to import an audio project your admin exported.
To create an online audio project for working alone:
Please select row(s) to remove assignment.
Expected full Audacity project path name
Return to the team screen, mark the project for offline use and change modes to let the project be downloaded. That will put the media files into a local folder where Audacity can get them.
segment.target: Kembali ke layar tim, tandai proyek untuk penggunaan offline dan ubah mode agar proyek dapat diunduh. Hal ini akan menempatkan file media ke dalam folder lokal di mana Audacity dapat memperolehnya.

segment.source: Audacity is current running. Close before using this function.
Open Audacity and use File:Export before importing
Use File:Import in Audacity to load current audio if desired.
Missing import file: {0}. Please open Audacity again and use File, Export to save the contents and then use Import here.
Missing file. Use Browse to search for it or Create to make a new file.
If you have an existing Audacity project you want to link to this passage, click BROWSE. To create a new Audacity project with an automatically created name, click CREATE.
Bible Id already exists. Please contact support if you need to work on this Bible.
Bible Id must begin with the language code and version (six letters).
Bible Id should begin with the language code.
User has been given Creator permission.
Information to use when publishing audio created by this team.
segment.target: Informasi untuk digunakan saat menerbitkan audio yang dibuat oleh tim ini.

segment.source: Deleting the team will delete all audio projects of the team.
A project must be added before recordings are allowed
segment.target: Sebuah proyek harus ditambahkan sebelum rekaman diizinkan
Mengabaikan perubahan kategori yang tidak valid '{0}'

segment.source: Upload or record a statement releasing the rights to publish material recorded by this speaker.
segment.target: Unggah atau rekam pernyataan yang melepaskan hak untuk mempublikasikan materi yang direkam oleh pembicara ini.

segment.source: Save or Clear your recording before uploading.
Changing segments will invalidate some recordings since they are linked to the segment start and end.
segment.target: Mengubah segmen akan membatalkan beberapa rekaman karena rekaman tersebut terkait dengan awal dan akhir segmen.

segment.source: Assign to a Group or Team Member
segment.target: Menetapkan ke Grup atau Anggota Tim

Audio Project {name0} was previously imported with a newer file: {date1}
Not a valid Portable Transcriber File
You are not a member of this audio project team. This audio project will not be accessible after import.
Please verify by clicking on the link in the authorization email sent to your account.
All Passages on all team projects
Copy the query contents and paste it into one or more of the AI chat tools:
The keyword to search on. Currently only searches against content names (not inside content). Non-English names are supported. Must be at least 3 characters in length.
Convert text to audio resource file
Drag a column header here to group by that column
Not a valid Incremental Transcriber File (ITF).

If this error occured while importing offline changes, please close the app immediately and reopen. If the error persists, contact support. If you continue to use the app, you will lose offline changes.
Import File does not contain current audio project.
Please select file to be uploaded.
Changes made since data provided to offline member:

ITF does not contain current audio project. It contains audio project {0}.

{0} passage(s) have invalid book or reference.

Please click the following link to accept the invitation:

segment.source: This team has no audio projects.
segment.target: Tim ini tidak memiliki proyek audio.

segment.source: Find a language by name, code, or country
Log Out and Force Data Reload
Something went wrong. The developers need to address this issue.
Invitation not accepted. You must login with the email that the invitation was sent to.
Unable to load audio project data offline.
You must be online to use this menu item.
segment.target: Anda harus online untuk menggunakan item menu ini.

segment.source: Do you want to save before leaving this page?
Your session will expire in {0} seconds. Would you like to continue?
Please select files to be uploaded.
File {0} is too large {1}. File Limit is {2}MB
segment.target: Berkas {0} terlalu besar {1}. Batas Berkas adalah {2}MB

segment.source: File {0} is an unsupported file type.
Drag and drop files here, or click here to browse for the files.
Drag and drop a file here, or click here to browse for the file.
Drag and drop a file here, or click here to browse for the file. Formats accepted are .png, .jpg (or .jpeg) and .webp.
segment.target: Seret dan jatuhkan berkas di sini, atau klik di sini untuk mencari berkas. Format yang diterima adalah .png, .jpg (atau .jpeg) dan .webp.

segment.source: Upload an intellectual property release for {0} in audio or visual format. Audio formats accepted are .mp3, .m4a, .wav or .ogg. Visual formats accepted are .pdf, .png, or .jpg.
segment.target: Unggah rilis kekayaan intelektual untuk {0} dalam format audio atau visual. Format audio yang diterima adalah .mp3, .m4a, .wav atau .ogg. Format visual yang diterima adalah .pdf, .png, atau .jpg.

segment.source: Upload an Incremental Transcriber File (itf file) exported from the Desktop app.
Upload Change Data from Desktop app.
Enter a URI link for a resource.
Enter text to be used as a resource. (Mark down formatting is allowed.)
Upload audio files in .mp3, .m4a, .wav or .ogg format or visual content in .pdf format.
Upload complete Audio Project Data from PTF
Upload audio files in .mp3, .m4a, .wav or .ogg format or visual content in .pdf format.
You can upload audio files in .mp3, .m4a, .wav or .ogg format.
you want to set up a project with multiple passages
segment.target: Anda ingin menyiapkan proyek dengan beberapa bagian

segment.source: you plan to record each passage as part of the workflow
segment.target: Anda berencana untuk merekam setiap bagian sebagai bagian dari alur kerja

segment.source: you have one or a few prerecorded audio files for passages
segment.target: Anda memiliki satu atau beberapa file audio yang telah direkam sebelumnya untuk bagian-bagian

segment.source: you just want to try out the program before you set up an actual project
segment.target: Anda hanya ingin mencoba program ini sebelum membuat proyek yang sebenarnya

segment.source: Create a project with one or a few audio files.
segment.target: Membuat proyek dengan satu atau beberapa file audio.

segment.source: Here are optional ways to get started. Later, you can use the Edit Audio Project Settings dialog box to change any of your initial settings.
segment.target: Berikut ini adalah cara opsional untuk memulai. Kemudian, Anda dapat menggunakan kotak dialog Edit Pengaturan Proyek Audio untuk mengubah pengaturan awal Anda.

segment.source: These controls can be used to find or create (using artificial intelligence -- AI) resources for internalizing the passage, section, chapter, or book.
Pasted data must contain two or three columns. One of them must be the reference.
Unable to parse {0} segment boundaries. {1} segment boundaries were adjusted.
segment.target: Tidak dapat mengurai {0} batas segmen. {1} batas segmen telah disesuaikan.

segment.source: Nothing changed! Perhaps no references matched?
Only the first selected note is used
segment.target: Hanya not yang dipilih pertama yang digunakan

segment.source: A Suffix is added to the end of the Reference (if there is no Description to override it).
Steps through connecting chunks of a general resource with {0} and passages.
Unused segment: only segments with References will create resources
General - to be used by multiple {0} or passages. (Uploaded files will only appear under Configure General.)
Set this and all previous steps complete
segment.target: Atur ini dan semua langkah sebelumnya selesai

segment.source: File is too large. File Limit is {1}MB
segment.target: File terlalu besar. Batas Berkas adalah {1}MB

segment.source: Peer Groups allow you to assign tasks to a group rather than an individual.
Do you want to remove the peer group and information about who are the members?
Do we need this group? Or just use team admin? People in this group will be able to do any step, even if it is assigned to a group they are not in.
segment.target: Apakah kita memerlukan grup ini? Atau hanya menggunakan admin tim? Orang-orang dalam grup ini akan dapat melakukan langkah apa pun, bahkan jika langkah tersebut ditugaskan ke grup yang bukan milik mereka.

segment.source: Not sure we need this permission either, because it is unclear what special things consultants do in this software. Independant Consultant's comments will be visible to all team members.
segment.target: Kami juga tidak yakin apakah kami memerlukan izin ini, karena tidak jelas hal-hal khusus apa yang dilakukan oleh konsultan di perangkat lunak ini. Komentar Konsultan Independen akan terlihat oleh semua anggota tim.

segment.source: CITs comments will only be visible to Mentors until a mentor approves the comment.
segment.target: Komentar CIT hanya akan terlihat oleh Mentor sampai mentor menyetujui komentar tersebut.

segment.source: Mentor's comments will only be visible to CITs. Mentors can approve CIT's comments to make them visible to the rest of the team.
General Peer Group with no special permissions. Use to assign discussions to team groups.

If you choose to publish, the {0} and the latest version of all passages and notes in all {0} in this Movement will be marked as published. If you have previously published and now choose 'Not Published', the {0} and passages and notes will be marked as not published.
segment.target: Jika Anda memilih untuk mempublikasikan, {0} dan versi terbaru dari semua bagian dan catatan di semua {0} dalam Gerakan ini akan ditandai sebagai dipublikasikan. Jika sebelumnya Anda telah menerbitkan dan sekarang memilih 'Tidak Diterbitkan', {0} dan bagian serta catatan akan ditandai sebagai tidak diterbitkan.

segment.source: If you choose to publish, the {0} and the latest version of all passages and notes in this {0} will be marked as published. If you have previously published and now choose 'Not Published', the passages and notes will be marked as not published.

segment.target: Jangan hapus item yang telah diterbitkan.

segment.source: You must be a Paratext user with access to FOBAI resources to use this feature.
segment.target: Anda harus menjadi pengguna Paratext dengan akses ke sumber daya FOBAI untuk menggunakan fitur ini.

segment.source: This audio project contains invalid references and will not sync to Paratext properly. (A valid reference would be 3:2-5 or similar.)
Select a column head and use CTRL-V to append table rows.
Deleting your user will block you from using the program and remove references to your work.
Install Paratext to be able to sync.
Log out and log in with Paratext button
Please choose a name other than your email address.
Allow user to create shared content projects.
segment.target: Memungkinkan pengguna untuk membuat proyek konten bersama.

segment.source: Frequency of data sync in minutes. 0 to turn off sync.

If the estimated time for download is too long for you, use the 'x' in the upper corner to close this dialog box. Then add a minimum and / or maximum {1} to the filter. The filter icon is {0} (a downward pointing dashed triangle) and is located before the {3} button on the {4} & PASSAGES tab. After setting the {1} filter, choose the filtered option on this dialog box to see how much time will be needed for the filtered {2}.
segment.target: Jika perkiraan waktu pengunduhan terlalu lama bagi Anda, gunakan 'x' di sudut atas untuk menutup kotak dialog ini. Kemudian tambahkan minimum dan/atau maksimum {1} ke filter. Ikon filter adalah {0} (segitiga putus-putus yang mengarah ke bawah) dan terletak sebelum tombol {3} pada tab {4} & PASSAGES. Setelah mengatur filter {1}, pilih opsi yang difilter pada kotak dialog ini untuk melihat berapa banyak waktu yang diperlukan untuk {2} yang difilter.

segment.source: Download {0}MB of offline audio project files? (It may take {1} to download on a fast Internet connection or {2} on a slow broadband connection.)
segment.target: Unduh {0}MB file proyek audio offline? (Mungkin diperlukan waktu {1} untuk mengunduh pada koneksi Internet yang cepat atau {2} pada koneksi broadband yang lambat).

segment.source: Not Published - not visible outside this project
You must have set up a Bible Id and Name in the Team Settings to publish to Akuo.
segment.target: Anda harus sudah menyiapkan Id dan Nama Alkitab di Pengaturan Tim untuk mempublikasikan ke Akuo.

segment.source: Beta - visible on the Akuo website when using the beta parameter (not available in the app)
segment.target: Beta - terlihat di situs web Akuo ketika menggunakan parameter beta (tidak tersedia di aplikasi)

segment.source: Public - visible to everyone using Akuo website or app
segment.target: Publik - dapat dilihat oleh semua orang yang menggunakan situs web atau aplikasi Akuo

segment.source: Changes made will affect source and all shared locations.
segment.target: Perubahan yang dibuat akan mempengaruhi sumber dan semua lokasi yang dibagikan.

segment.source: Do you want to save and discard data with errors?
segment.target: Apakah Anda ingin menyimpan dan membuang data yang mengalami kesalahan?

segment.source: Link is not a correctly formatted URL
Are you sure you want to add publishing rows?

segment.target: Jumlah kolom tidak valid ({0}). Mengharapkan {1} kolom.

segment.source: Once publishing rows are added, there is no automated way to remove them. Publishing projects cannot be made flat projects.
segment.target: Setelah baris penerbitan ditambahkan, tidak ada cara otomatis untuk menghapusnya. Proyek penerbitan tidak dapat dijadikan proyek datar.

Book Designation must not be a Scripture book code.
This project contains resources that can be used in other projects for Internalization.

segment.target: Hubungi Nathan Payne (nathan_payne@sil.org) untuk akses membuat konten bersama.

segment.source: Audio Projects cannot be changed to team audio projects later
Supports audio projects that are offline available
Select the Offline Available option on the audio project card menu.
Set up a team audio project

Set up the audio project, dividing work into passages that can be assigned to various transcribers and editors. Transcribers and editors can work online or offline by downloading or importing the audio project.
Work in a team audio project
Audio Project has been set up online
A audio project has been set up online. Transcribers and editors can work online, offline by selecting the Offline Available option on the audio project card menu, or offline by importing it.
